partnerDetails.about:
We partner with our industrial technology customers to usher them through the digital transformation. With positive impetus and intelligent technologies, we help them become more efficient and maintain their success.

Our service portfolio includes;

  • Smart buildings
  • Smart industries
    - Energy management & Digitisationconsulting
    - Engineering
    - Automation / industrial communication / Sensor Technologie
    - robotic / cobots
    - Drives
    - Safety
    - logistics solution Optilog®
    - cable assambly
  • Smart consumers
    - Specialist retailer coaching 

Better planning
We work with digital twins and possess expertise in all facets of e-planning. This lets us offer the highest level of efficiency in engineering and assembly of switchgear.

Better procurement
We support lean ordering and transaction processes with e-shops and marketplaces. Step by step, we take you along the path to Industry 4.0.

Better support
We have in-house experts for all issues concerning robotics, drive technology, sensors, RFID solutions and image-processing systems.

Better together
Alexander Bürkle offers you the largest partner network in Germany. As a provider of technology and services for industry, trades and commerce.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.



Digitization consulting

We supportour customers in their digitization activities and prepare them for the digitalfuture.

Everyoneout of the Industry sector knows about the importance of digitization. But howcan the digital transformation be implemented in your own company? Thisquestion cannot be answered in general. In every single company there arevarious fields of action for digitization approaches. In addition, theactivities must fit seamlessly into your own company strategy. Therefore thereis no silver bullet for approaching the digital transformation in your owncompany. This is where the digitization consulting comes in. Our consultantssupport you in identifying the right digitization steps and implementing them.

At first,your company is analyzed in a guided process. What is your digital positiontoday? Where are risks and opportunities for your company? And how coulddigitization affect your business model?

Based onthese considerations we analyze the individual fields of action. Out of theseresults we build up your individual digitization strategy with thecorresponding roadmap.
